Roses 2014 Preview: Tennis

Following some strong performances at last year's Roses, the tennis club go to Lancaster confident that they can beat their rivals to earn the points

Roses 2014 Preview: Cycling

After a comprehensive victory last year, York should whitewash their Lancastrian opponents in their own back yard this time around

Roses 2014 Preview: Volleyball

After a mixed bag of results in 2013, the volleyball teams will be hoping to go to Lancaster as a stronger unit and leave Lancashire with all the points

Roses 2014 Preview: Basketball

After two heavy defeats at the hands of the Red Rose in 2013, York's basketball teams will be hoping for better results this time around

Roses 2014 Preview: Darts

After a mixed set of results last year, York's darts teams will be looking to win all of the points on offer at Lancaster

Roses 2014 Preview: Trampolining

The last two years have seen York beat Lancaster on the trampoline. The White Rose will be hoping for a third successive win.

Roses 2014 Preview: Swimming and Water Polo

The swimming and water polo club will be hoping that their teams can bring home all sixteen points for the White Rose.

Roses 2014 Preview: Sailing

After a brilliant season of competition, the sailing club will be confident of grabbing the points when they take on Lancaster in Bolton this weekend

Roses 2014 Preview: Pool & Snooker

After mixed results last year, the Pool & Snooker club will be aiming for a whitewash at this year's Roses away at Lancaster

Roses 2014 Preview: Squash

After last year's clean sweep, the four York squash teams will be hoping to get the better of the Lancaster teams on their own turf.

Roses 2014 Preview: Men's Cricket

After the firsts were well beaten and the seconds secured victory in Roses 2013, both sides will want to post victories over Lancaster at this year's tournament.

Roses 2014 Preview: Rowing

Bad weather may have blighted some of their fixtures this season but all crews are raring to go; they want a whitewash and they are certainly capable.

Roses 2014 Preview: Archery

The archery takes place on Sunday morning at this year's Roses with the White Rose hoping to trump their Lancaster rivals and take as many points as possible.

Roses 2014 Preview: Men's Rugby

York favorites UYRUFC are aiming for another sensational Roses

Roses 2014 Preview: Women's Rugby

With an unbeaten BUCs season already in the bag, the Black and Gold will be looking for a tricky away win in the Women's Rugby

Roses 2014 Preview: Women's Football

After a comfortable victory over Lancaster last year and another fantastic season, UYWAFC will be confident of earning the points for York at this year's Roses tournament

Roses 2014 Preview: Lacrosse

League and Cup doubles in BUCS for both the men's and the firsts lacrosse sides says it all, really. These fixtures will be an easy 12 points in the bag for York.

Roses 2014 Preview: American Football

After a disappointing defeat at last year's Roses. The York Centurions will be out for revenge and will look to post a victory against their biggest rivals

Roses 2014 Preview: Hockey

York have measurably more strength in depth, so the Black and Gold can be hopeful of earning more points than they concede

Roses 2014 Preview: Fencing

Expect two out of three wins here at the least, whilst a total whitewash of Lancaster certainly isn't impossible.

Roses 2014 Preview: Men's Football

Lancaster inflicted a whitewash on York in 2013, but with a fantastic BUCS campaign behind them York will be confident they can exact revenge during this year's Roses competition.

Nervy men's volleyball team ousted in four sets

Luck was not on the men's firsts volleyball team's side as they were edged out by a score of 1-3 by a spirited Lancaster side

Netball firsts impress despite Lancaster win

The pressure was on for York and Lancaster's netball firsts clash to deliver high drama and sporting excellence, and - despite York losing to a team that possessed greater finesse and pace in the centre of the court - it absolutely delivered

Lancaster take the spoils in table tennis

The York table tennis team was not expecting to do fantastically against Lancaster in this year's Roses, but unfortunately they were on the end of a hammering by the Red Rose

Squash firsts in superb Roses win

York men's firsts squash team were a force to be reckoned with at Roses 2013

Indoor football firsts dominate to claim points

The indoor women's firsts football team set the Sports Tent ablaze on Saturday afternoon when they comprehensively defeated their Lancastrian rivals in front of a lively crowd

York triumph in indoor women's seconds

A late penalty was not enough for Lancaster to rescue a draw as the women's seconds team proved their credentials in a well-fought 3-2 victory in front of a rowdy crowd in the Sports Tent

York sailors take dramatic Roses win

A dramatic final race win saw the White Rose claim four points in Saturday's sailing fixtures

Women's football see off Lancaster to take Roses points

A swashbuckling performance from the Women's 1st XI Football team in front of a jovial crowd on 22 Acres saw them turn on the style to brush aside the Lancaster team 3-1

Men's firsts run riot in Roses hockey encounter

A large vocal crowd were treated to some excellent hockey on the JLD, as the Men's 1st team ran out convincing 4-0 winners against a Lancaster side largely unable to trouble their opponents
